question: Will my client be linked to my account if the FFM dropped my NPN from their account?
text:
Will my client be linked to my account if the FFM dropped my NPN from their account?
          
        
NO, clients migrating from the FFM will not remain linked to the pre-registered producers account if their NPN is no longer associated with their account on the FFM. A Pre-registered Pennie producer NPN must be linked to their clients account at time of data migration for them to be linked to a producers book of business. If a customer is no longer linked to their FFM producer, they can easily find and re-designate their producer on pennie.com
To learn more, see 
How does a customer find and designate a producer?
